column1: this picture gram well its a boy and the boy is the time he his right hand up at the clock but his left hand is holding standing on his right foot his left leg is bent at the knee the stool is falling down and little girl is telling him what him but she can hardly keep from laughing at the same time here standing there on both and got her finger up to her mouth trying to keep from laughing at him well he had the little on the stool and the and he one hand up on the clock and the other hand he a the little girl is standing there she got a little short skirt on and her sleeve the short and in one pointing to her face with her right hand s do you see what do you see going on in this oh on this side of the picture well this is a fountain that found a leak and its going every which way up there and I dont know what youd call that and theres a little the fountain is squirting up into and beside it theres a little also a little cross that and on this side its well she got two on the on on the left hand on this and looking this way and standing on her right foot mostly her other foot is to to keep the balance and in the corner of the room and behind her is a little trap door for I suppose into s into
